definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The fire, it burned for a long time. Protected them.
sentences.chinese: 火兒燒了好長一段時間，保護着他們。

sentences.english: Then he bummed a cigarette and asked me for a light.
sentences.chinese: 爾後，他要了一支菸，向我借了個火兒。

sentences.english: Why are you in such a temper?
His words are meant to be annoying and there is no doubt that they will have a fight later.
sentences.chinese: 他這話說得就是拱火兒去的，一會兒準得打起來。
